Name: Number of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' activities

Name: Percentage of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE that are not followed by Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases where 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' does not happen

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Number of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE with amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE by STAFF MEMBER
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE in variants that contain Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER

Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration SAVED by EMPLOYEE' out of all 'Request Payment'
